findings.message:
Reentrancy in LPTokenMaster._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#136-150):
	External calls:
	- pair.accrueAccount(_sender) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#142)
	- pair.accrueAccount(_recipient) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf[_sender] -= _amount (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#145)
	- balanceOf[_recipient] += _amount (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#146)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in LPTokenMaster.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#130-134):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(_sender,_recipient,_amount) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#131)
		- pair.accrueAccount(_sender) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#142)
		- pair.accrueAccount(_recipient) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _approve(_sender,msg.sender,allowance[_sender][msg.sender] - _amount) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#132)
		- allowance[_owner][_spender] = _amount (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#184)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:

		- pair.accrueAccount(_sender) (../..0x7b3b69eab43c1aa677df04b4b65f0d169fcdc6ca.sol#142)
